articles.title: Statement of DPRK Government
articles.content:
Statement of DPRK Government
 Pyongyang, August 7 (KCNA) -- The Government of the Democratic People's Republic of Korea on Monday issued a statement over the fact that the U.S. and other hostile forces, terrified at the growth of the DPRK's state nuclear force in quality and quantity, are steeped in the most intensive sanctions, pressure and provocations against it.
					 The statement says:
					
					 On August 6, the U.S. framed up "sanctions resolution" 2371 at the United Nations Security Council which is geared to completely block the DPRK's economic development and improvement of the people's livelihood, branding its test-launch of ICBM as "a threat to international peace and security".
					
					 This UN "sanctions resolution", to all intents and purposes, is an outcome of diabolical attempts of the U.S. to isolate and stifle the DPRK, which constitutes a flagrant infringement upon its sovereignty and an open challenge to it.
					
					 The DPRK's access to the strongest nuclear force is a fair and legitimate measure for self-defense to protect the country's sovereignty and the nation's right to existence from the high-handed and arbitrary acts of the U.S. which has made it its business to pursue the policy of extreme hostility and pose nuclear threat to the DPRK well over half a century.
					
					 The successive test-launch of ICBM by the DPRK was a stern warning to the U.S. which, being entrenched far across the Pacific, wages reckless and perilous military provocation and despicable campaign of sanctions on the DPRK.
					
					 However, the U.S. goes more frenzied and desperate instead of accepting the DPRK's existence and learning to coexist with the latter. It is trying to drive the situation of the Korean peninsula to the brink of nuclear war, running amuck to conduct missile drill against the DPRK and deploying massive strategic equipment to the peninsula.
					
					 It was against this backdrop that the U.S. manipulated UNSC to rig up the "sanctions resolution" more heinous than ever, placing a total ban even on normal trade activities and economic exchange, thereby disclosing before the whole world its evil intention to obliterate the ideology and system of the DPRK and exterminate its people.
					
					 On the other hand, the U.S. causes such a racket with no time to wipe their mouth, making impudent remarks that it is considering the so-called military option targeting the DPRK.
					
					 There are countries to which the ridiculous threats of the U.S. are working and there are countries which lie prostrate at the bluff of the U.S.
					
					 The U.S. claiming to be the "only superpower of the world" and the DPRK's neighbors hardly any smaller in size than the U.S. are all so frightened at merely two ICMB test-launches by the DPRK that they are making much a scene baying at each other. Watching them go frantic only redoubles the DPRK's pride in the country's great might and reaffirms its faith that the path it had chosen is the only way to survive and prosper.
					
					 The DPRK has already gained everything it needed while having everything wanted in its hands through an arduous struggle under the harshest sanctions regime created by numerous UN "sanctions resolutions" adopted at the instigation of the U.S during the last several decades. It is only a forlorn hope to consider any chance that the DPRK would be shaken an inch or change its stance by the sanctions of this new kind imposed upon by the hostile forces. 
					
					 As the U.S. launched full-scale provocation against the DPRK across all fields of politics, economy and military, nothing can alter the will and resolve of the army and people of the DPRK to respond by taking resolute retaliatory measures.
					
					 The DPRK Government solemnly states as follows to cope with the grave situation created by the frantic acts of the U.S. and other hostile forces;
					
					 First, the DPRK condemns in the strongest terms and totally rejects the anti-DPRK "sanctions resolution" of the UNSC rigged up by the U.S. and other hostile forces as a wanton infringement upon the sovereignty of the country.
					
					 The DPRK is taking measures to strengthen the self-defensive nuclear deterrence in order to counter the policy of extreme hostility and nuclear threat against it from the U.S., the biggest nuclear weapons state of the world. Terming these measures "a threat to international peace and security" is a gangster like logic indicating that the rest of the world should either become U.S. colonies serving its interests or fall victim to its aggression.
					
					 The countries, that openly pursue their ambition to maintain permanent nuclear hegemony by conducting most of the nuclear tests in the world and launching ICBM whenever they please, are adopting illegal and unlawful "sanctions resolutions" to incriminate the DPRK's bolstering of self-defensive nuclear force and enforcing those sanctions over its alleged "violation" of them. This constitutes the height of outrageous double standard.
					
					 As long as the U.S. hostile policy and nuclear threat continue, the DPRK, no matter who may say what, will never place its self-defensive nuclear deterrence on the negotiation table or flinch an inch from the road chosen by itself, the road of bolstering up the state nuclear force.
					
					 Second, now that the U.S. did forge the "sanctions resolution" by manipulating the UNSC to obliterate the DPRK's sovereignty and rights to existence and development, the DPRK will move into its resolute action of justice as it had already clarified.
					
					 The U.S. is acting absurd by resorting to the anachronistic sanctions and pressure campaign against the DPRK, instead of appreciating the strategic status of the DPRK and paying proper attention to its repeated warnings. The unwise conduct of the U.S. will only speed up its own extinction.
					
					 As the gangsters of the U.S. remain unabated in their mean and heinous provocation, the DPRK will further increase the strength of justice to thoroughly eradicate the cause of war and aggression and never back away from this fight to a finish.
					
					 Third, the DPRK will make the U.S. pay dearly for all the heinous crime it commits against the state and people of this country.
					
					 The U.S. once waged a tragic war that plunged this land into a sea of blood and fire, and has been leaving no stone unturned to obliterate the DPRK's ideology and system century after century. The U.S. is sadly mistaken if it considers its mainland a safe haven for being on the other side of the ocean.
					
					 Those countries which were offered "thanks" from the U.S. as a reward for taking part in the conspiracy to invent the heinous "sanctions resolution" against the DPRK through their backdoor arrangement this time, too, would never be able to evade the responsibility for increasing the tensions on the Korean peninsula and jeopardizing peace and security of the region.
					
					 If the U.S. fails to act with discretion, persisting in its reckless attempts to stifle the DPRK, we will not waver or hesitate to use any form of ultimate means.
					
					 The DPRK will hold fast to the line of simultaneously developing the two fronts, the lasting banner of defending peace, and continue to march straight forward to the end of the road chosen by itself without the slightest deviation.

articles.title: Spokesman for CCNR Slams S. Korean Authorities' Reckless Remarks
articles.content:
Spokesman for CCNR Slams S. Korean Authorities' Reckless Remarks
 Pyongyang, August 7 (KCNA) -- A spokesman for the Consultative Council for National Reconciliation issued the following statement on Monday as regards the fact that the south Korean authorities are making reckless remarks against the DPRK after the U.S. cooked up the "sanctions resolution" 2371 by using the voting machine of the United Nations on August 6:
					 No sooner had the UN "resolution" been adopted than those of Chongwadae began letting out impudent remarks that "it is important that a "resolution" was rapidly adopted by consensus" and "it is more significant that China and Russia agreed to impose sanctions".
					
					 Those of the south Korean foreign ministry asserted that the adoption of the recent "sanctions resolution" is of practical significance in blocking the DPRK's financing channel related with the development of its nuclear weapons as it will reduce its foreign currency earning and deal a considerable blow to it. Kang Kyong Hwa, foreign minister of south Korea on a junket to Philippine, "appreciated and thanked for the successful adoption of the UN resolution", saying "the resolution contains very important and substantial contents."
					
					 Against this backdrop, the foreign ministry in a commentary of its spokesman welcomed the above-said "resolution", terming it "a manifestation of the resolute will of the international community never to allow the north's development of its nuclear weapons and missiles." It urged the DPRK to "stop its reckless provocation at once and come out for a dialogue for denuclearization and peace as early as possible." It claimed that the south Korean regime would steadily make efforts for the north's complete denuclearization and settlement of durable peace on the Korean peninsula, sincerely implementing the UN "resolutions" in close cooperation with the international community.
					
					 This is just the height of sycophancy toward the U.S. peculiar to the thrice-cursed traitors seeking to curry favor with their master U.S. by sacrificing even compatriots for the sake of outsiders.
					
					 The DPRK has already clarified that its step for bolstering the nuclear force for self-defence is an entirely just one for tackling the ceaseless nuclear threats and blackmails from the U.S. and its ICBM tests were to send a serious warning to the U.S. persisting in making absurd remarks after losing its temper.
					
					 It also offered the south Korean regime an opportunity for repentance, reminding it of the fact that it will only lose everything if it persists in foolish acts of following in the footsteps of the conservative "regime", faulting the DPRK's ICBM tests.
					
					 This being a hard fact, the puppet regime cried out for imposing "independent sanctions", disregarding the patience and magnanimity shown by the DPRK, and unhesitatingly engaged in such risky gambling as playing the role of a shock brigade of the U.S. in its outrageous sanctions racket to pressurize the DPRK.
					
					 Such disgusting behavior of the puppet regime clearly shows that the regime is just a dog bred by the U.S. and a pack of confrontation maniacs similar to the conservative group and the public of south Korea are so foolish as to expect the improvement of the north-south relations from such thrice-cursed politicians.
					
					 By joining the U.S. in cooking up the "sanctions resolution" against the DPRK the puppet regime revealed itself that its talk about "dialogue" was hot air and it will regard the DPRK as enemy, not as a country of fellow countrymen.
					
					 It should judge itself the impact of the sanctions and pressure racket on the north-south relations.
					
					 It had better face up to the acute situation that the group of crazy Trump is crying out for not "ruling out a war", and think twice about the catastrophic calamity to be entailed by it.
					
					 It should not forget that it will completely lose the opportunity for dealing with the DPRK and everything will end at once if it persistently resorts to stupid and reckless acts.
					
					 The more the south Korean authorities let out impudent and reckless remarks against the trend of the times, the dearer price they have will have to pay for it.

articles.title: Kim Yong Nam Attends Iranian Presidential Inauguration
articles.content:
Victory Belongs to DPRK Thanks to Kim Jong Un: Minju Joson
 Pyongyang, August 6 (KCNA) -- The world is seething over the continuous successes of the test-launch of the ICBM Hwasong-14 in the DPRK.
					 Voices praising respected Supreme Leader Kim Jong Un are being heard from different parts of the world as he stroke terror into the U.S. boasting of being the "only superpower" and changed the world political structure through the two successful test-launches of ICBM Hwasong-14.
					
					 A lot of personages and organizations of the world's political and social circles are raising their voices praising the peerlessly great man. Voices of admiration for Kim Jong Un are ringing out even in the hostile country U.S. as he put the independent dignity of the country and national power on the highest level and brought about a great change in the world political circles challenging the "only superpower".
					
					 This is the clear proof of the highly strengthened overall national power and strategic position of the DPRK, Minju Joson on Sunday says in a commentary.
					
					 It goes on:
					
					 No matter how frantically the U.S. escalates the moves to stifle DPRK, the U.S. can never prevent the army and people of the DPRK from advancing along the road of independence, Songun and socialism chosen by themselves, united close around the great illustrious commander.
					
					 The Korean army and people, keeping in mind the honor of holding illustrious commander of Mt Paektu Kim Jong Un, who is admired by the world, will put an end to the U.S. persistent moves to isolate and stifle the DPRK and surely build the socialist country on this land, the most powerful country envied by the world.

articles.title: Kim Yong Nam Meets Iranian President
articles.content:
Kim Yong Nam Meets Iranian President
 Tehran, August 6 (KCNA-Correspondent) -- Talks were held between Kim Yong Nam, president of the DPRK Presidium of the Supreme People's Assembly on a visit to Iran, and Hassan Rouhani, president of the Islamic Republic of Iran, on Sunday.
					 Kim Yong Nam referred to the fact that the line of simultaneously developing the two fronts set out by the Workers' Party of Korea is being implemented to the letter under the guidance of respected Supreme Leader Kim Jong Un and the achievements gained in the struggle for independence, Songun and socialism under the banner of self-development-first principle.
					
					 He stressed the need to further develop the friendly and cooperative relations between the DPRK and Iran and the Non-Aligned Movement.
					
					 Hassan Rouhani said the Iran-DPRK relations have developed on a very high stage, expressing the belief that the friendly relations between the two countries which have jointly struggled against the U.S. will boost in broad fields in the future, too.
					
					 Earlier, Kim Yong Nam respectively met Speaker of Majlis Ali Larijani and First Vice-President Eshaq Jahangiri of Iran.

articles.title: Kim Yong Nam Meets Zimbabwean President, Cuban Vice-President of Council of Ministers
articles.content:
Kim Yong Nam Meets Zimbabwean President, Cuban Vice-President of Council of Ministers
 Tehran, August 7 (KCNA-Correspondent) -- Kim Yong Nam, president of the Presidium of the Supreme People's Assembly of the DPRK, Saturday had a talk with Robert G. Mugabe, president of the Republic of Zimbabwe, who took part in the Iranian presidential inauguration.
					 The Zimbabwean president said his government and people will always remember the selfless aid sent by President Kim Il Sung.
					
					 He said Zimbabwe has invariably protected its sovereignty in defiance of sanctions of the West for several decades since its independence as it has learned from the example of the DPRK.
					
					 He highly appreciated that under the wise guidance of respected HE Kim Jong Un the DPRK has turned into a military power with the powerful deterrence capable of defeating the U.S. trying to dominate the world.
					
					 Kim Yong Nam also had a talk with Ulises Rosales Del Toro, vice-president of the Council of Ministers of Cuba, who paid a courtesy call on him on the same day.
					
					 The vice-president expressed the belief that the Korean people would successfully advance the revolutionary cause started and developed by President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il under the tested guidance of respected Supreme Leader Kim Jong Un.
					
					 Noting that Cuba is resolutely opposing the U.S. sanctions and pressure against the DPRK, he expressed full support to the just steps of the DPRK for bolstering up defence capabilities including ICBM test-fires and achieving the prosperity of the country.
					
					 He declared the will to boost the relations of friendship and cooperation between the two countries in the future, too, expressing his deep thanks to the Korean people who are sending invariable solidarity to the Cuban people's just cause.
					
					 Meanwhile, Kim Yong Nam, met the vice-prime minister of the DR Congo, the parliamentary speaker of Sri Lanka, the speaker of the National Assembly of Cameroon, the special envoy of the Namibian president and the president and the secretary general of the Inter-Parliamentary Union.

articles.title: Kim Yong Nam Leaves Tehran
articles.content:
Kim Yong Nam Leaves Tehran
 Tehran, August 7 (KCNA-Correspondent) -- Kim Yong Nam, president of the Presidium of the Supreme People's Assembly of the DPRK, left Tehran Monday after taking part in the Iranian presidential inauguration ceremony at the invitation of the government of the Islamic Republic of Iran.
					 Departing with him were Choe Hui Chol, vice-minister of Foreign Affairs, and other suite members.

articles.title: Messages of Greeting to State Leaders of ASEAN Countries
articles.content:
Messages of Greeting to State Leaders of ASEAN Countries
 Pyongyang, August 7 (KCNA) -- Kim Yong Nam, president of the Presidium of the Supreme People's Assembly of the DPRK, Monday sent messages of greeting to the state leaders of ASEAN countries to mark the 50th founding anniversary of ASEAN (Association of Southeast Asian Nations).
					 They included the presidents of Indonesia, Vietnam and Laos, the king of Cambodia, the president of Myanmar, the king of Thailand, the 15th king of Malaysia, the president of Singapore and the sultan and state leader of Brunei Darussalam and the president of Philippines.
					
					 Kim in the messages said that ASEAN is making a lot of successes in building and further developing the political security, economy and social and cultural community while ensuring the regional lasting peace and stability through the joint efforts of its member nations.
					
					 He wished the ASEAN countries bigger successes in their work, expressing belief that the friendly and cooperative relations between the DPRK and ASEAN and its member nations would grow stronger.

articles.title: Ri Yong Ho Greets FMs of ASEAN Countries and Its SG
articles.content:
Ri Yong Ho Greets FMs of ASEAN Countries and Its SG
 Pyongyang, August 7 (KCNA) -- Ri Yong Ho, minister of Foreign Affairs of the DPRK, Monday sent messages of greeting to his counterparts of member nations of the Association of South East Asian Nations (ASEAN) and its secretary general on the occasion of the 50th anniversary of its foundation.
					 They are the foreign minister of Indonesia, the deputy prime minister and foreign minister of Vietnam, the foreign minister of Laos, the senior minister and minister of Foreign Affairs and International Cooperation of Cambodia, the foreign ministers of Myanmar, Thailand, Malaysia, Singapore and the Philippines and the secretary general of ASEAN.
					
					 In the messages Ri Yong Ho noted that ASEAN has been developed into the powerful community leading the regional problems on the principles of respecting sovereignty and non-interference in other's internal affairs and is now raising the weighty voices in the regional and international arenas.
					
					 Expressing the belief that the relations of friendship and cooperation between the DPRK and those countries and other member nations would grow stronger, he wished them successes in their work.

articles.title: Vice-President of SPA Presidium Meets ASEAN Diplomatic Envoys
articles.content:
Vice-President of SPA Presidium Meets ASEAN Diplomatic Envoys
 Pyongyang, August 7 (KCNA) -- Kim Yong Dae, vice-president of the Presidium of the Supreme People's Assembly of the DPRK, had a talk with diplomatic envoys of ASEAN countries here at the Mansudae Assembly Hall Monday to mark the 50th founding anniversary of ASEAN.
					 They included Bambang Hiendrasto, ambassador of Indonesia, Pham Viet Hung, Vietnamese ambassador, Phonekham Inthaboualy, Lao ambassador, and Sin Bunthoeurn, Cambodian ambassador.

articles.title: DPRK Premier Inspects Units in North Phyongan Province
articles.content:
DPRK Premier Inspects Units in North Phyongan Province
 Pyongyang, August 7 (KCNA) -- DPRK Premier Pak Pong Ju inspected various units in North Phyongan Province.
					 He visited the Ragwon Machine Complex, Ponghwa Chemical Works and the Sinuiju Cosmetics Factory. He learned about production and technical equipment and encouraged the working people who are concentrating their efforts on the implementation of the five-year strategy for national economic development. 
					
					 Acquainting himself with the farming on the Sinam Cooperative Farm in Ryongchon County and the Ryongbuk Cooperative Farm in Yomju County and the introduction of organic farming with the help of mud snails, he underscored the need to raise the hot wind of scientific farming.
					
					 Consultative meetings of officials concerned were held at those units.
					
					 The meetings discussed the measures to map out proper management strategy as required by the socialist economic management, provide raw and other materials necessary for the production in good time and raise land utility rate.

articles.title: Equatorial Guinean Government Delegation Here
articles.content:
Equatorial Guinean Government Delegation Here
 Pyongyang, August 7 (KCNA) -- A government delegation of the Republic of Equatorial Guinea led by Victor Grange Mehile, minister of Agriculture, Animal Husbandry and Food, arrived here on Monday.

articles.title: Foreign Guests Here to Attend Int'l Festival in Praise of Great Persons of Mt Paektu
articles.content:
Foreign Guests Here to Attend Int'l Festival in Praise of Great Persons of Mt Paektu
 Pyongyang, August 7 (KCNA) -- Christer Lundgren, chairman of the SwedenÔºçKorea Friendship Association who is co-chairman of the European Regional Preparatory Committee for the Gathering 2017-Praise to the Great Persons of Mt Paektu, and his party and a delegation of the Swedish Preparatory Committee for the Gathering 2017-Praise to the Great Persons of Mt Paektu led by Ola Obrant arrived here Monday to participate in the 5th International Festival in Praise of the Great Persons of Mt Paektu.

articles.title: National Exhibition of August 3 Consumer Goods Held in DPRK
articles.content:
National Exhibition of August 3 Consumer Goods Held in DPRK
 Pyongyang, August 7 (KCNA) -- The National Exhibition of August 3 Consumer Goods was held at the Consumer Goods Exhibition of the Ministry of Food and Consumer Goods Industries in the DPRK from August 3 to 6.
					 On display there were more than 7,700 varieties of consumer goods produced by industrial establishments and housewives' work-teams across the country.
					
					 Pyongyang City presented more than 2,000 varieties of consumer goods, including household electric appliances, knitwear, summer shoes and crafts made with waste cigarette packs.
					
					 North Phyongan Province exhibited many new products made with its locally available raw materials.
					
					 Among them were kettles and teacups made with trees in Mt Myohyang and lacquered noodle trays and seasoning containers.
					
					 Seen at the exhibition were also feather-crafts, glazed earthenware, grass-works, products made with bamboo, ceramics and woodcrafts presented by other provinces of the country.
					
					 The exhibition served as an occasion for promoting the exchange of experiences among local communities and encouraging the August 3 Consumer Goods Production Movement.

articles.title: 7th Rason International Trade Exhibition Opens
articles.content:
7th Rason International Trade Exhibition Opens
 Rason, August 7 (KCNA) -- The 7th Rason International Trade Exhibition opened in Rason City Monday with due ceremony.
					 Exhibited there are machines and equipment, light industrial goods, chemical products, electric and electronic products, building materials, foodstuff and consumer goods, medicines and vehicles presented by more than 110 units of the DPRK and other countries.
					
					 Attending the ceremony were Jo Jong Ho, chairman of the Rason City People's Committee who is also chairman of the organizing committee of the exhibition, officials concerned, working people in the city, delegates of different countries, those who presented products to the exhibition and foreign businessmen active in the Rason economic and trade zone.
					
					 A reception was given that day.

articles.title: S. Korean Warmongers' Foolhardy Provocation under Fire
articles.content:
S. Korean Warmongers' Foolhardy Provocation under Fire
 Pyongyang, August 7 (KCNA) -- The warmongers of the south Korean puppet military are getting reckless in their confrontation hysteria against the DPRK, frightened by the strategic position and military muscle of the ever-victorious DPRK.
					 The war maniacs launched a mad-cap live shell firing drill targeting the DPRK in the hotspot waters of the West Sea on August 7 despite the unanimous public denunciation and opposition.
					
					 In the afternoon of that day they perpetrated a military provocation by firing hundreds of shells and rockets with 155-mm self-propelled howitzers, K-9s, coastline artillery pieces of the 6th navy brigade and the Yonphyong unit deployed on Paekryong and Yonphyong Islands, surface-to-surface guided weapon Spike and even army gunships.
					
					 This reckless military action is very dangerous as it is timed to coincide with the moves of the U.S. bringing its nuclear strategic assets frequently to the Korean peninsula to stage a mad-cap drill for preemptive nuclear attack, the airdrop drill being intensively staged by the U.S. 25th Infantry Division and 82nd Airborne Division to invade the DPRK and the drill being staged by the troops of the U.S. 10th Infantry Division in south Korea to get familiar with the procedures of strike on the strategic objects of the DPRK.
					
					 It is a well-known fact that President Trump and other heavyweights of the U.S. administration have revealed their scenario for invading the DPRK, openly blustering that they would rather unleash a war than allow the DPRK's nuclear missile development.
					
					 It is none other than the puppet military warmongers who are taking the lead in carrying out the U.S. war policy while revealing their bellicose stance to stand against the DPRK at any cost, pursuant to the U.S. hostile policy towards and strategy for invading the DPRK.
					
					 Whenever news of the DPRK's great successes in the test-launches of its ICBM Hwasong-14 were reported, the puppet military warmongers resorted to the arms buildup and military provocation. They are now acting rashly before the very eyes of the army of the DPRK, risking their lives.
					
					 The DPRK's army, which has put the whole U.S. territory in the range of its strike, remains unperturbed by such shelling drill of the puppet army.
					
					 It is the resolute determination and will of the DPRK's army to annihilate those who dare to stand against it by dint of its invincible arms of Songun and throw them into the abyss of the final ruin.
					
					 The puppet military warmongers should not act rashly, bearing in mind that if they act like a puppy knowing no fear of the tiger, not only the Paekryong and Yonphyong Islands but also Seoul will turn into a sea of flames.
					
					 The army of the DPRK is fully ready to make the provocateurs experience what the shower of Songun Korea's heavy strikes is like at any time and in any place.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun Calls for Eradicating Conservative Media in S. Korea
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun Calls for Eradicating Conservative Media in S. Korea
 Pyongyang, August 7 (KCNA) -- The "citizens action for getting 'KBS', 'MBC' to work properly" consisting of more than 200 organizations in south Korea, including the Press Trade Union and the Citizens Federation for Democratic Press, recently held large-scale rallies and news conferences in demand of stop to media's disinformation and the abolition of Park Geun Hye's evil practices.
					 Charging that the directors of KBS, MBC and other media appointed by Park Geun Hye and others swimming against the mindset of candlelight demonstrators persist in disinformation for the ultra-right conservatives standing against the progressive and democratic reformist forces, the south Koreans from all walks of life expressed the will to continue the struggle for removal of Park's evils.
					
					 Commenting on the fact, Rodong Sinmun Monday says this is a just struggle motivated by their essential demand for retaking the freedom of media violated by the conservatives and making the society just.
					
					 Prevailing in south Korea are only false and fabricated news reports for conspiracy that lack of impartiality and objectivity, because media organs are still controlled by the remnants of Park.
					
					 In order to realize the true democracy of media, it is needed to wipe out the vicious conservative media inciting pro-U.S. sycophancy and treachery, fascist dictatorship and confrontation with the fellow countrymen.

articles.title: Kim Il Sung's Exploits for War Victory Lauded by Russian Websites
articles.content:
Kim Il Sung's Exploits for War Victory Lauded by Russian Websites
 Pyongyang, August 7 (KCNA) -- Special write-ups were posted on Russian websites from July 24 to 26 with the approach of the 64th anniversary of the Korean people's victory in the Fatherland Liberation War.
					  The Khabarovsk Territory online paper Zebri Deve carried articles, illustrated with a photo of President Kim Il Sung.
					
					 The articles said that on the occasion of July 27 the international community is recollecting Generalissimo Kim Il Sung who defeated U.S. and Japanese imperialism in one generation, referring to the military exploits performed by him to be glorified long in the world history of anti-imperialist struggle.
					
					 Website Patrioti Moskva posted the following article titled "July 27 of victory".
					
					 In 1950 when the Korean War broke out, no one thought that the nearly two-year old DPRK would win victory by defeating the U.S., the head of imperialists.
					
					 The service personnel and people of the DPRK united close around their leader drove the U.S. into the abyss of ruin.
					
					 July 27 is the day when the DPRK, not a big country in the East, smashed into smithereens the myth of the "mightiness" of the U.S. that did not suffer a single defeat in its war history of aggression.
					
					 In articles titled "Generalissimo Kim Il Sung" and "Event which jolted the world 64 years ago" website Irkutskblogspot. Ru praised the immortal exploits Kim Il Sung, invincible and iron-willed commander and outstanding strategist, performed in winning victory in the war.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un's Work Published in Russia
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un's Work Published in Russia
 Pyongyang, August 7 (KCNA) -- Respected Supreme Leader Kim Jong Un's work "War Veterans Are Our Precious Revolutionary Forerunners Who Created the Indomitable Spirit of Defending the Country" was brought out in booklet by the Pskovaya Poligrafiya Publishing House of Russia on the occasion of the 64th anniversary of the Korean people's great victory in the Fatherland Liberation War.
					 The congratulatory speech, made by Kim Jong Un on July 25, Juche 104 (2015), clarifies that July 27 of Korea is the second Day of Liberation when the Korean people honorably defended the dignity and sovereignty of their country from the aggression by the U.S. imperialists, and the day of the victors that drove the U.S. imperialists into a downhill march towards ruin.
					
					 It also says: The war veterans have devoted all their life to the independent reunification and prosperity of their country. Their noble fighting spirit and splendid patriotic feats will shine brilliantly in inerasable golden letters in the history of the heroic struggle of our people.
					
					 A book-releasing ceremony took place at the publishing house on July 28.

articles.title: Scrapping of "Agreement" on Sexual Slavery Demanded
articles.content:
Scrapping of "Agreement" on Sexual Slavery Demanded
 Pyongyang, August 7 (KCNA) -- The "agreement" on sexual slavery for the Imperial Japanese Army should be unconditionally scrapped at once in the light of its illegality and the unanimous demand of all Koreans for thorough settlement of Japan's unheard-of past crimes, Rodong Sinmun Monday says in a commentary.
					 What matters is whether the south Korean authorities have the will to scrap the humiliating "agreement" with Japan or not, the commentary notes, and goes on:
					
					 These days they are revealing their scheme to realize cooperation for pressurizing the DPRK in collusion with Japan, talking about "forward-looking ties".
					
					 What is difference between such scheme and the treachery of traitor Park Geun Hye who sold off the interests of the nation through sycophantic and treacherous policy and confrontation with the compatriots?
					
					 The people's struggle for repeal of the "agreement" is still going on in south Korea. If the south Korean authorities truly have the will to remove the evils, they should pay heed to the strong demand of the public.
					
					 They should make a bold decision to scrap the "agreement" on the sexual slavery as early as possible, once they started investigation into the crimes.

articles.title: Gobierno de la RPDC denuncia la campana de sancion y presion de EE.UU. y sus fuerzas satellites
articles.content:
Gobierno de la RPDC denuncia la campana de sancion y presion de EE.UU. y sus fuerzas satelites
Pyongyang, 7 de agosto (ACNC) -- Con respecto a que EE.UU. y otras fuerzas hostiles, atemorizados por el incremento cualitativo y cuantitativo de las fuerzas armadas nucleares de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea, recurren a la campana de sancion y presion y los actos provocadores mas brutales de la historia, el gobierno de la RPDC hizo publica el dia 7 la siguiente declaracion:
					Al acusar el lanzamiento de prueba de ICBM de la RPDC como "amenaza a la paz y seguridad internacionales", EE.UU. volvio a fabricar el dia 6 la "resolucion de sancion" No. 2371 del Consejo de Seguridad de la ONU, orientada a impedir completamente el desarrollo economico y la mejora de los niveles de la vida del pueblo en la RPDC.
					
					De punta a cabo, esa "resolucion" es un producto de la atroz campana de EE.UU. para aislar y atropellar a la RPDC y por lo tanto, constituye la violacion flagrante a nuestra soberania y el desafio frontal a la RPDC.
					
					Nuestra posesion de las mas potentes fuerzas armadas nucleares deviene la justa medida autodefensiva que hemos tomado para defender la soberania del pais y el derecho a existencia de la nacion desde el acto coercitivo y arbitrario de EE.UU. que viene practicando la extremada politica hostil y la amenaza y chantaje nucleares contra la RPDC durante mas de medio siglo.
					
					  Nuestros seguidos lanzamientos de prueba de cohetes balisticos intercontinentales fueron la advertencia severa remitida a EE.UU. que se apela, mas alla del Pacifico, a la imprudente aventura militar y la sucia campana de sancion contra la RPDC.
					
					  En lugar de reconocer nuestra existencia y optar por coexistir con nosotros, EE.UU. realiza con mas afan los entrenamientos de misiles contra la RPDC e introduce muchos pertrechos estrategicos para volver a llevar al borde de guerra nuclear la situacion de la Peninsula Coreana.
					
					  Bajo tales circunstancias, EE.UU. invento la referida "resolucion de sancion" mas cruel que nunca con el objetivo de obstaculizar totalmente las normales actividades comerciales y hasta el intercambio economico, abusando del Consejo de Seguridad de la ONU. Asi, expuso a todo el mundo su siniestra intencion de acabar con nuestra idea, regimen y pueblo.
					
					  Por otra parte, arma escandalos pronunciando disparates de que esta deliberando la supuesta opcion militar contra la RPDC.
					
					  Nuestro pais no pertenece a la categoria de los que cogen miedo a la ridicula amenaza de EE.UU. y se arrodillan ante su fanfarronada.
					
					  EE.UU., que se cree "unica superpotencia del mundo", y nuestros vecinos tan gigantes como el, se rasgan las vestiduras por los lanzamientos de prueba de ICBM de nuestro Estado, que suman 2 veces apenas.
					
					  Este panorama miserable nos hace sentirnos mas orgullosos de las inagotables fuerzas de la RPDC y mas convencidos de que nuestra salvacion y via residen unicamente en el incremento de las fuerzas armadas nucleares.
					
					  La RPDC ya consiguio y tomo en su mano todo lo necesario a traves de la lucha mas dura que ha librado en medio de la sancion mas brutal del mundo, producto de las "resoluciones de sancion" de la ONU, inventadas varias veces en las decadas anteriores por la iniciativa de EE.UU.
					
					  Por eso, no pasa de ser una ilusion irrisoria la idea de que la RPDC vacilara y cambiara la actitud ante la nueva sancion de las fuerzas hostiles.
					
					  Puesto que EE.UU. incurrio en la provocacion total en todas las ramas de la politica, la economia y los asuntos militares contra la RPDC, el ejercito y pueblo de esta tienen la invariable voluntad y firme decision de responderle con la venganza resuelta. 
					
					Frente a la grave situacion creada debido a la desesperada campana de EE.UU. y las fuerzas hostiles, el gobierno de la RPDC declara como lo siguiente:
					
					Primero, rechazamos totalmente la "resolucion de sancion" anti-RPDC del Consejo de Seguridad de la ONU fabricada por EE.UU. y las fuerzas hostiles estigmatizandola como violacion flagrante de la soberania de la RPDC.
					
					Calificar como "amenaza a la paz y seguridad internacionales" el disuasivo nuclear autodefensivo de la RPDC para llevar al traste con la extremada politica de hostilidad y la amenaza y chantaje nucleares de EE.UU., primera potencia nuclear del mundo, significa la logica de bandido de que todos los paises del planeta deban ser colonias a favor de los intereses de EE.UU. o victimas de su agresion.
					
					Los paises, que persiguen abiertamente la ambicion de mantener para siempre la hegemonia nuclear realizando el mayor numero de pruebas nucleares en el mundo y lanzando a cualquier hora los cohetes balisticos intercontinentales, inventan esas "resoluciones" ilegales que cuestionan el incremento de las fuerzas armadas nucleares de autodefensa de la RPDC e imponen a esta las sanciones con el pretexto de "violacion" de esos documentos. Esto constituye el climax de la pauta de doble rasero.
					
					Digan lo que digan otros, nunca pondremos sobre la mesa de negociaciones el disuasivo nuclear de caracter autodefensivo ni retrocederemos ni un paso atras en el camino ya optado de aumentar las fuerzas armadas nucleares del Estado, mientras continuen las maniobras anti-RPDC y la amenaza nuclear de EE.UU..
					
					Segundo, tomaremos las acciones resueltas y justas, como hemos declarado ya, puesto que EE.UU. invento al fin y al cabo la "resolucion de sancion" del Consejo de Seguridad de la ONU para acabar con la soberania y los derechos a subsistencia y desarrollo de la RPDC.
					
					EE.UU. emprende la accion estupida de adelantar su autodestruccion al recurrir a la anacronica campana de sancion y presion anti-RPDC, en vez de ver correctamente la posicion estrategica de nuestro Estado y escuchar nuestras advertencias reiteradas.
					
					Para hacer frente a las continuas provocaciones mas brutales y aviesas de EE.UU., multiplicaremos el poderio de justicia para eliminar el factor de agresion y guerra y pondremos punto final a esta batalla.
					
					Tercero, liquidaremos cuentas finales de los inauditos crimenes cometidos por EE.UU. contra nuestro Estado y pueblo.
					
					Seria el error mas grande para EE.UU. si este piensa que podra salir ileso, por la fortuna de encontrarse allende del Oceano, a pesar de su antecedente criminal de haber convertido en un bano de sangre y en llamas el territorio coreano mediante la guerra mas atroz y utilizar de siglo en siglo todos los medios y metodos para eliminar nuestra idea y regimen.
					
					Los paises, que recibieron el "mensaje de agradecimiento" de EE.UU. a cambio de su complicidad en la fabricacion de la "resolucion de sancion" anti-RPDC mediante los debates a puertas cerradas, tampoco podran eludir la responsabilidad de haber agravado la situacion de la Peninsula Coreana y puesto en peligro la paz y seguridad de la region.
					
					Si EE.UU. sigue actuando con imprudencia sin dejar su intento de aplastar a la RPDC, esta no vacilara en usar el cualquier medio final.
					
					En lo adelante tambien, la RPDC marchara recto hasta el final por la senda escogida sin dar rodeos en virtud de la linea de desarrollo paralelo de la construccion economica y la de fuerzas armadas nucleares, la cual constituye la bandera eterna de defensa de la paz.

articles.title: Las autoridades surcoreanas pagaran el precio mas horrible, senala vocero de CRN
articles.content:
Las autoridades surcoreanas pagaran el precio mas horrible, senala vocero de CRN 
Pyongyang, 7 de agosto (ACNC) -- Tan pronto como EE.UU. volvio a inventar el dia 6 la "resolucion de sancion" No.2371 contra la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea movilizando los mecanismos de votacion de la ONU, los titeres surcoreanos lanzan las tonterias contra la RPDC.
					Al respecto, el vocero del Consejo de Reconciliacion Nacional hizo publica el dia 7 una declaracion.
					
					Cuando fue adoptada la "resolucion" de la ONU, las gentuzas de Chongwadae sueltan las palabras absurdas tales como "es importante la adopcion unanime y pronta de la resolucion" y que "reviste el gran significado el acuerdo de China y Rusia con las sanciones", adelanta el documento y prosigue:
					
					A su vez, las morrallas del Ministerio de Relaciones Exteriores disparatean que esta adopcion reducira el ingreso de divisas del Norte, reviste el significado eficiente en impedir la ruta de financiamiento para el desarrollo de armas nucleares y seria un golpe considerable al Norte. La cancillera surcoreana Kang Kyong Hwa, que esta de visita en Filipinas, picoteo que "evalua y agradece a la adopcion exitosa de la resolucion de la ONU" y que "el documento tiene los contenidos de eficiencia importante y sustancial".
					
					Insatisfecha con esto, la cancilleria surcoreana publico un comentario del vocero subrayando que da bienvenida a la adopcion de la "resolucion" No. 2371 de la ONU y que deviene la expresion reiterada de la voluntad resuelta de la sociedad internacional de no tolerar jamas el desarrollo de armas nucleares y misiles del Norte. E insistio atrevidamente en que el Norte debe renunciar inmediatamente las imprudentes provocaciones y optar de inmediato el camino de dialogo para la desnuclearizacion y la paz aceptando seriamente la advertencia unida de la sociedad internacional. Y continuo que el "gobierno" cumplira fielmente las "resoluciones" de la ONU bajo la estrecha colaboracion con la sociedad internacional y seguira esforzando por la desnuclearizacion del Norte y el establecimiento de la paz duradera de la "Peninsula Coreana".
					
					Esto es el climax del caracter proyanqui y servil a grandes potencias que puede ser practicado solo por los compinches traidores que tratan de ganar la simpatia de su amo convirtiendo su connacional RPDC en la victima de las fuerzas ajenas.
					
					Las medidas de la RPDC para el fortalecimiento de sus fuerzas armadas nucleares autodefensivas devienen la opcion justa para hacer frente a las incesantes amenazas y chantajes nucleares del pais norteamericano. Y ademas, el reciente lanzamiento de prueba de ICBM se realizo para enviar una seria advertencia a EE.UU. que dice las tonterias absurdas sin tener ningun juicio. 
					
					Tambien, la RPDC dio la oportunidad de corregir sus errores a las autoridades surcoreanas haciendo recordarles que podran perderlo todo si no cesan de hacer los actos absurdos de repetir la trayectoria del "poder" conservador cuestionado el lanzamiento de prueba del cohete balistico intercontinental de la RPDC.
					
					Pero, insatisfechos con hablar de la "sancion independiente" abusando de la paciencia y la generosidad de su connacional RPDC, los titeres surcoreanos se entregan sin vacilacion alguna al peligrosismo juego de azar de presentarse como brigada de choque para la criminal campana de sancion y presion anti-RPDC de su amo gringo.
					
					Tal actitud asquerosa demuestra claramente que los titeres surcoreanos no pasan de ser los pobrecitos perros norteamericanos y los maniacos conflictivos tan identicos a la banda conservadora y que son muy absurdos diversos sectores surcoreanos que depositan su esperanza de la mejora de vinculos intercoreanos en estos tontos politicos. 
					
					Al adherirse a la "resolucion de sancion" anti-RPDC de EE.UU., las autoridades surcoreanas mostraron claramente que su referencia al "dialogo" es una absurdidad hipocrita y revelaron su posicion de tratar a la RPDC no como su connacional, sino como su enemigo.
					
					Ellas deben juzgar por si mismas el rumbo del desarrollo de las relaciones intercoreanas que se crearan por la campana de sanciones y presiones.
					
					Y deben meditar la situacion aguda, en que los compinches del fanatico Trump hablan a toda voz de la "guerra", y las calamidades catastroficas que se emanen de ella.
					
					Los compinches titeres no deben olvidar que perderan para siempre la oportunidad de reunirse con su connacional y que todo se acabaria en un santiamen si sigan recurriendo a la imprudencia absurda e imprudente.
					
					Por mucho que pronuncien las palabras absurdas marchando a contrapelo de la corriente de la epoca, las autoridades surcoreanas pagaran un precio mas devastador y horrible.

articles.title: Kim Yong Nam participa en ceremonia de investidura de presidente de Iran
articles.content:
Kim Yong Nam participa en ceremonia de investidura de presidente de Iran
Teheran, 5 de agosto (corresponsal de ACNC) -- El presidente del Presidium de la Asamblea Popular Suprema de la RPDC, Kim Yong Nam, tomo parte en la ceremonia de toma de posesion del presidente de la Republica Islamica de Iran, que tuvo lugar el dia 5 en la sede de la Asamblea Consultiva Islamica en Teheran.
					Participaron en la ocasion los jefes de Estado y gobierno y las delegaciones de varios paises, los representantes de las organizaciones internacionales incluyendo la Union Europea y las figuras del gobierno, la Asamblea Consultiva Islamica, la capa militar, la religion y otros estratos de Iran.
					
					Hubo el discurso de felicitacion del presidente de la Asamblea Consultiva Islamica de Iran.
					
					El presidente irani Hassan Rouhani pronuncio el juramento de investidura y el discurso sobre la politica interior y exterior de su gobierno.
					
					El mandatario manifesto la posicion del gobierno de desarrollar la economia, intensificar el poderio de defensa nacional, asegurar la paz y la democracia y realizar las cooperaciones constructivas con la sociedad internacional.
					
					Afirmo que Iran hara frente con aguda vigilancia a las tentativas de EE.UU. de frustrar el acuerdo nuclear y hara todo lo posible por garantizar la paz y la seguridad de la region del Medio Oriente.
					
					El mismo dia, el visitante coreano fue invitado a la recepcion ofrecida por el presidente irani.

articles.title: Conversan en Teheran Kim Yong Nam y Hassan Rouhani
articles.content:
Conversan en Teheran Kim Yong Nam y Hassan Rouhani
Teheran, 6 de agosto (corresponsal de ACNC) -- Tuvieron lugar el dia 6 las conversaciones entre el presidente del Presidium de la Asamblea Popular Suprema de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea, Kim Yong Nam, de visita en la Republica Islamica de Iran, y el presidente irani, Hassan Rouhani.
					El visitante dijo que gracias a la guia del Maximo Dirigente Kim Jong Un, se materializa cabalmente la linea de desarrollo paralelo presentada por el Partido del Trabajo de Corea y se logran exitos en la lucha por la independencia, el Songun y el socialismo bajo la bandera de dar prioridad al autofortalecimiento.
					
					Resalto la necesidad de reforzar y desarrollar aun mas las relaciones de amistad y cooperacion entre Corea e Iran y el Movimiento de los No Alineados.
					
					El dignatario persico senalo que anteriormente, se ampliaron y se desarrollaron en la etapa muy elevada las relaciones bilaterales y expreso la conviccion de que seguiran fortaleciendose en los sectores mas amplios las relaciones de amistad de ambos paises que lucharon juntos contra EE.UU.
					
					Con anterioridad, Kim Yong Nam se reunio por separado con el presidente de la Asamblea Consultiva Islamica, Ali Larijani, y el primer vicepresidente irani, Eshaq Jahangiri.

articles.title: Kim Yong Nam se reune con el presidente de Zimbabwe y el vicepresidente de Cuba
articles.content:
Kim Yong Nam se reune con el presidente de Zimbabwe y el vicepresidente de Cuba
Teheran, 7 de agosto (corresponsal de ACNC) -- El presidente del Presidium de la Asamblea Popular Suprema de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea, Kim Yong Nam, departio con el presidente de la Republica de Zimbabwe, Robert G. Mugabe, quien participa en la ceremonia de toma de posesion del presidente de la Republica Islamica de Iran.
					En la ocasion, el mandatario africano dijo que el gobierno y el pueblo de su pais no olvidaran jamas a Su Excelencia Presidente Kim Il Sung quien les ha ayudado desinteresadamente.
					
					Continuo que siguiendo el ejemplo de Corea, su pais pudo defender su soberania a pesar de la sancion del Occidente de varias decadas despues de la independencia.
					
					Aprecio mucho el hecho de que bajo la sabia orientacion de Su Excelencia Kim Jong Un, la RPDC se ha convertido en una potencia militar con formidable disuasivo capaz de derrotar a EE.UU. deseoso de tomar la hegemonia mundial.
					
					Tambien, Kim Yong Nam se reunio con el vicepresidente del Consejo de Ministros de la Republica de Cuba, Ulises Rosales del Toro quien le hizo una visita de cortesia.
					
					El vicepresidente cubano expuso la conviccion de que bajo la probada direccion del respetado Maximo Dirigente Kim Jong Un, el pueblo coreano continuara excelentemente la causa revolucionaria, allanada y desarrollada por el Presidente Kim Il Sung y el Dirigente Kim Jong Il.
					
					Reiterando el rechazo de Cuba a la sancion y presion de EE.UU. contra la RPDC, manifesto el apoyo total a las justas medidas de la RPDC por incrementar el poderio de defensa nacional y lograr la prosperidad del pais, tales como el lanzamiento de prueba de ICBM.
					
					Agradecio profundamente al pueblo coreano que envia invariable solidaridad a la justa causa del pueblo cubano.
					
					Y expuso la voluntad de ampliar y desarrollar tambien en el futuro las relaciones de amistad y cooperacion entre ambos paises.
					
					Por otra parte, Kim Yong Nam se reunio con el viceprimer ministro de la Republica Democratica del Congo, el presidente de Asamblea Estatal Nacional de la Republica Democratica Socialista de Sri Lanka, el presidente del Senado de la Asamblea Nacional de la Republica de Camerun, el enviado especial del presidente de la Republica de Namibia, el presidente y el secretario general de la Union Interparlamentaria.

articles.title: Kim Yong Nam parte de Teheran
articles.content:
Kim Yong Nam parte de Teheran
Teheran, 7 de agosto (corresponsal de ACNC) -- El presidente del Presidium de la Asamblea Popular Suprema de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea, Kim Yong Nam, partio el dia 7 de Teheran luego de participar en la ceremonia de investidura del presidente irani por la invitacion del gobierno de la Republica Islamica de Iran. 
					Salieron con el el viceministro de Relaciones Exteriores, Choe Hui Chol, y otros acompanantes.

articles.title: Kim Yong Nam envia mensajes de felicitacion a los lideres de varios paises
articles.content:
Kim Yong Nam envia mensajes de felicitacion a los lideres de varios paises
Pyongyang, 7 de agosto (ACNC) -- El presidente del Presidium de la Asamblea Popular Suprema de la RPDC, Kim Yong Nam, envio el dia 7 los mensajes de felicitacion a los jefes de Estado de ASEAN con motivo del aniversario 50 de la fundacion de esta entidad regional.
					Entre los destinatarios se distinguen los presidentes de la Republica de Indonesia, la Republica Socialista de Vietnam, la Republica Democratica Popular Lao, el rey de Cambodia, el presidente de la Republica de la Union de Myanmar, el rey de Tailandia, el 15o rey de Malaysia, el presidente de la Republica de Singapur, el emir y jefe de Estado de Brunei Darussalam y el presidente de la Republica de Filipinas.
					
					En los mensajes, el remitente apunto que gracias a los esfuerzos conjuntos de esos paises y los miembros de la ASEAN, esta logra muchos exitos en construir y desarrollar la comunidad de seguridad politica, economica y sociocultural preservando la paz y estabilidad duraderas de la region.
					
					Convencido de que se fortaleceran y se desarrollaran las relaciones de amistad y cooperacion entre la RPDC y ASEAN y entre la RPDC y los respectivos paises, el remitente formulo votos por mayores exitos en sus trabajos.

articles.title: Ri Yong Ho felicita a sus pares de paises miembros de ASEAN y secretario general
articles.content:
Ri Yong Ho felicita a sus pares de paises miembros de ASEAN y secretario general
Pyongyang, 7 de agosto (ACNC) -- En ocasion del aniversario 50 de la fundacion de la Asociacion de Naciones del Sudeste Asiatico (ASEAN), el canciller coreano Ri Yong Ho envio mensajes de felicitacion a sus homologos de los paises miembros de ASEAN y su secretario general.
					  Entre los destinatarios figuran el canciller de la Republica de Indonesia, el vicepremier y canciller de la Republica Socialista de Vietnam, el canciller de la Republica Democratica Popular Lao, el ministro de Estado y de Relaciones Exteriores y Cooperacion Internacional del Reino de Camboya, los cancilleres de la Republica de la Union de Myanmar, el Reino de Tailandia, Malasia, la Republica de Singapur, la Republica de Filipinas y el secretario general de la ASEAN.
					
					  En las misivas, el remitente senala que durante 50 anos despues de su fundacion, la ASEAN se ha desarrollado como comunidad poderosa que toma el control de los problemas regionales en el principio de respeto a la soberania y la no intervencion en asuntos internos y sigue elevando su voz en los escenarios regional e internacional.
					
					  Deseo exitos en los trabajos de los paises miembros de la organizacion regional, convencido de que se ampliaran y se desarrollaran mas las relaciones de amistad y cooperacion entre la RPDC y cada uno de ellos.

articles.title: Kim Yong Dae se reune con representantes diplomaticos de ASEAN
articles.content:
Kim Yong Dae se reune con representantes diplomaticos de ASEAN
Pyongyang, 7 de agosto (ACNC) -- En ocasion del aniversario 50 de la fundacion de la Asociacion de Naciones del Sudeste Asiatico (ASEAN), el vicepresidente del Presidium de la Asamblea Popular Suprema de la RPDC, Kim Yong Dae, departio el dia 7 en el Palacio de los Congresos Mansudae con los representantes diplomaticos de los paises miembros de esa entidad.
					  En esta ocasion estuvieron presentes el embajador indonesio Bambang Hiendrasto, el vietnamita Pham Viet Hung, el lao Phonekham Inthaboualy y el cambodiano Sin Bunthoeurn.

articles.title: Inaugurada VII Exposicion Internacional de Mercancias de Rason
articles.content:
Inaugurada VII Exposicion Internacional de Mercancias de Rason
Rason, 7 de agosto (ACNC) -- Tuvo lugar el dia 7 en esta ciudad la ceremonia de inauguracion de la VII Exposicion Internacional de Mercancias de Rason con la participacion de Jo Jong Ho, presidente del Comite Popular de la Ciudad de Rason y del comite preparatorio de la exposicion, los funcionarios de ramas interesadas, los trabajadores ciudadanos, los representantes y exponentes de varios paises y los extranjeros que se dedican a las actividades empresariales en la Zona Economica y Comercial de Rason.
					En esta ocasion, se exhibieron las maquinas, los productos de industria ligera, quimicos, electricos y electronicos, los materiales de construccion, los alimentos de uso diario, las medicinas y los medios de transporte expuestos por mas de 110 entidades de la RPDC y de varios paises.
					
					En la ceremonia hubo discursos.
					
					El mismo dia, se ofrecio un banquete con motivo de la inauguracion.

articles.title: Belicistas surcoreanos vuelven a perpetrar el entrenamiento de disparo de canones
articles.content:
Belicistas surcoreanos vuelven a perpetrar el entrenamiento de disparo de canones
Pyongyang, 7 de agosto (ACNC) -- Con el paso del tiempo, se torna mas imprudente la furia belica anti-RPDC de los belicistas de la capa militar surcoreana, tan pasmados ante la posicion estrategica y el poderio militar de la RPDC.
					Pese a la critica y el rechazo unanime dentro y fuera del pais, los belicistas surcoreanos libraron freneticamente el dia 7 en zonas maritimas mas candentes del Mar Oeste de Corea el entrenamiento de disparo de proyectiles contra la RPDC.
					
					Por la tarde del mismo dia, los belicistas surcoreanos lanzaron centenares de proyectiles movilizando no solo los obuses autopropulsados k-9 de 155mm, las artillerias costeras y el Spike, pertrecho teledirigido tierra-tierra, de la 6a brigada naval y la unidad de Yonphyong, estacionadas en las islas de Paekryong y Yonphyong, sino tambien los helicopteros armados de tropas terrestres.
					
					La gravedad del caso es que esta imprudencia militar se coincide en el tiempo con que las propiedades estrategicas nucleares del imperio yanqui se introducen a cualquier hora en la Peninsula Coreana para el adiestramiento de ataque preventivo nuclear, la 25a division de infanteria y la 82a division de infanteria paracaidista de tropas norteamericanas ejercitan de manera intensa el asalto aereo para la agresion al Norte y los bandidos armados de la 10a division de infanteria adiestran en el suelo surcoreano el orden de ataque a los objetos estrategicos de la RPDC.
					
					Esta bien conocido por todo el mundo el hecho de que el presidente Trump y otras cabecillas de la administracion norteamericana exponen abiertamente su intento de agredir a la RPDC diciendo abiertamente que "realizaran la guerra en vez de dar vista gorda al desarrollo de misil nuclear del Norte de Corea".
					
					A su vez, los belicistas de la capa militar surcoreana se ponen en la delantera de la ejecucion de la politica belica de EE.UU. exponiendo su naturaleza belicista de enfrentarse a toda costa con la RPDC al adherirse a la cada dia mas abierta politica hostil anti-RPDC y la estrategia de agresion al Norte de su amo gringo.
					
					Cada vez que se transmitian las noticias sobre el pleno exito de los sucesivos lanzamientos del cohete balistico intercontinental "Hwasong-14", los belicistas surcoreanos se recurrian al incremento de las fuerzas armadas y la provocacion militar y, ahora, se atreven a portarse insolentemente cerca de la RPDC.
					
					El ejercito coreano, que toma en su esfera de golpe a toda la extension geografica del territorio principal de EE.UU., no hace caso a los entrenamientos de disparo de proyectiles tan baratos de los titeres.
					
					Y mantiene una determinacion y voluntad resueltas de exterminar con el despiadado poderio de las fuerzas armadas del Songun a los que se atreven a ofender a la RPDC y caerlos al abismo.
					
					Los belicistas de la capa militar titere deben portarse con prudencia al tener bien presente que debido a sus imprudencias podran convertirse en el mar de fuego no solo las islas Paekryong y Yonphyong, sino tambien hasta Seul.
					
					Estamos bien listos para mostrar cuandoquiera y dondequiera a los provocadores el fuerte poderio militar de Corea del Songun.
